page.title: 07AQUEDUCT SCHOOL EXTENSION
page.content: Children came flooding into the new estate and so the school became overcrowded. A new extension had to be built. Just before summer 1984 the builders started to move in. First of all they cleared the site and created a mound with all the waste.Then the site was fenced off.After the foundations were dug they filled up the bottom half with concrete and then built a wall seven bricks high for protection.They then put in a damp proof course.At that point they had reached floor level.Brick by brick, step by step the walls crept slowly upward.The builders had to work 39 hours a week.When the building is completed it will be inspected and if there is nothing wrong it is accepted by the county council.It has rained a lot so the extension will not be finished until October 1985.
